text: Sergei Martynov may refer to: * Sergey Martynov (archer) (born 1965), Kazakh archer * Sergei Martynov (politician) (born 1953), former Belarusian Minister for Foreign Affairs * Sergei Martynov (serial killer), Russian serial killer accused of killing nine women between 1992 and 2010 * Sergei Martynov (sport shooter) (born 1968), Belarusian rifle shooter * Sergey Martynov (wrestler) (1971–1997), Russian Greco-Roman wrestler
title: Sergei Martynov
